actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Retirement Act to increase to 2 1/2 percent the multiplication factor for determining annuities for certain Federal employees engaged in hazardous duties.

summary.text: Provides, under the Civil Service Retirement Act, for an increase to 2 1/2 percent in the multiplication factor for determining annuities for those Federal employees engaged in hazardous duties. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Retirement Act to increase to 2 1/2 percent the multiplication factor for determining annuities for certain Federal employees engaged in hazardous duties.
